PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-03432002-03-140,  ,  TC,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the LIFE SAVING EQUIPMENT REGULATIONS by updating references to technical manuals or documents, by requiring all ships under 25 m in length to ensure that their emergency rafts and rescue platforms float free in the event of a sinking, by extending the period for servicing those devices from 12 to 24 months under certain circumstances, and by requiring all passenger vessels to conduct a pre-departure safety briefing.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0122 Publication Date: 2002-03-27
Attachments
